    @allure.title("TC-07: Remember me checkbox saves phone number")
    def test_remember_me(self, page, login_page):
        with allure.step("Open login page"):
            page.goto("https://dev.bito.uz/login")
    
        with allure.step("Enter phone number"):
            login_page.enter_phone_number("941234000")
    
        with allure.step("Enter incorrect password"):
            login_page.enter_password("wrongpass")
    
        with allure.step("Click checkbox"):
            login_page.click_checkbox()
    
        with allure.step("Click login button"):
            login_page.click_login_button()
    
        with allure.step("Refresh page"):
            page.reload()
    
        with allure.step("Check saved phone number"):
            value = login_page.get_element(("xpath", "//*[@name='phone_number']")).input_value()
